channel.title: Need C++ Help [PAYING!]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Basically I run a game server for a game called helbreath. The server is written in C/C++. The server runs on 4 server files. GateServer, GameServer, MainLogin Server and World Server.
Basically I am receiving attacks from another computer that is connecting his World Server to my mainlogin server which results in it crashing.
Example ttp://img354.imageshack.us/img354/9710/problemyb6.png
Now what I was going to ask guys, is there a code that someone can write that will not accept anymore World Server Connections to my main login? http://www.mediafire.com/?m3ldlbyc9xx There is server source. Any recommendations or code would be great. Thanks
If you want payment then give me your paypal.
